entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
